Digital: May, 2007 |format=Hardcover; electronic |pages=360 |}} '''''Tolkien Studies'': Volume 4''', published in [[2007]], is the fourth volume of the annual review ''[[Tolkien Studies (journal)|Tolkien Studies]]''. This issue reprints J.R.R. Tolkien's essay "[[The Name 'Nodens']]", first published in [[1932]].
Thomas Honegger's article includes extracts from unpublished drafts of ''[[The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth]]''.
The front cover reproduces Tolkien's [[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Ae Adar Nin 2.png|handwritten notes]] about ''[[Ae Adar Nín]]'' on the back of a postcard.{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=13570|articlename=Tolkien Studies IV. 2007|dated=|website=TB|accessed=1 January 2012}} {{Tolkienstudiesnav|3|5}} ==Contents== * Articles ** Carl F.
